card_text: ___ ________: To misinterpret or misrepresent something, especially in a way that changes its intended meaning. When something is said or written, it can be ____ ____________, leading to confusion or misunderstanding. The word suggests a deliberate distortion or an unintentional misinterpretation. It conveys the idea of twisting or reshaping the original meaning into something different. Being ____ ____________ can result in miscommunication, especially if the true intent is obscured.
image_prompt: A person speaking to a group of people, who are all interpreting the message differently, with confused and questioning expressions on their faces. The speaker looks frustrated as their words are being misconstrued and misunderstood, with the listeners forming their own, varied interpretations. The setting is a diverse, modern office space with a vibrant, yet confused atmosphere. The image should convey the idea that effective communication is challenging and messages can be interpreted in unintended ways. No text is included in the image, with the focus solely on the expressive faces and body language of the characters.
